sentences.english: The magnetic coupling also can be used in autoclaves and mixers .
sentences.chinese: 磁力傳動器亦可用於各種高壓容器及攪拌釜上。

sentences.english: High speed magnetic drive pump just fulfills the special requirements.
sentences.chinese: 採用高速磁力泵可以滿足這些特殊要求。

sentences.english: The magnetic line can be extended to the channels and collaterals acupoints of people's vola.
sentences.chinese: 更將磁力線延伸到人們足底的經絡穴位。

sentences.english: A null-balance system is provided by balancing the magnetic forces by electrostatic forces.
sentences.chinese: 零位平衡系統是靠靜電力來平衡磁力而造成的。

sentences.english: The plasma flows in a loop along a magnetic field line.
sentences.chinese: 這些等離子體沿着磁力線的方向流動噴發。

sentences.english: The observation data of mobile geo-magnetism along Xianshuihe faults for 10 years are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對鮮水河斷裂帶10多年的磁力觀測資料進行處理。

sentences.english: The mixture was agitated overnight on a magnetic stirrer at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之間就被激動的混合物在室溫下磁力攪拌器。

sentences.english: This should tell you something else because of the physics of magnetics.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這個磁力物理，還可以告訴你們其它的一些事。

sentences.english: The coal hydroliquefaction is conducted in a magnetically stirred autoclave.
sentences.chinese: 在磁力攪拌高壓釜內進行了文題的研究。

sentences.english: To use electromagnetic force, the fluid being pumped must be a good electrical conductor.
sentences.chinese: 爲了利用電磁力，被抽送的流體必須爲優良的導電體。

sentences.english: The magnetic lines of force don't exist , they are defined by scientists.
sentences.chinese: 磁力線並不存在，它是由科學家所定義。

sentences.english: Will not attack brass serrations of magnetic chucks.
sentences.chinese: 不會腐蝕磁力吸盤上的銅紋部份。

sentences.english: The infrared ray warms up the magnetic force treatment, ameliorative blood circulation, instauration physical strength.
sentences.chinese: 紅外線溫熱磁力治療，改善血液循環，恢復體力。

sentences.english: One new microcomputer control technique used on switched reluctance motor driving system is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種磁力線開關型混合勵磁磁阻電機方案。

sentences.english: Magnetic slot-in loader, second to none, perfect protection to disc.
sentences.chinese: 磁力吸入式，全球首創，保護碟片好。

sentences.english: Some maverick scientists believe that both gravity and light are electromagnetic forces.
sentences.chinese: 某些獨立研究科學家們認爲，重力和光都是電磁力。
